
Citing IRDAP
============

.. attention::
   The paper `van Holstein et al. (2019) <https://arxiv.org/abs/1909.13108>`_ is currently only on *arXiv.org*, but is to be published soon. Please return to this page later for the link and BibTeX citation to the paper in the journal.  

If you use IRDAP for your publication, please cite `van Holstein et al. 
(2019) <https://arxiv.org/abs/1909.13108>`_. For data in pupil-tracking mode please additionally 
cite `van Holstein et al. (2017) <https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2017SPIE10400E..15V>`_.
Please use all upper case letters when mentioning IRDAP, and include the version number.
